Name: Decree
SimpleDes: Friendly Unit
Des: Friendly unit that cannot attack.

Name: Neutrality
SimpleDes: Neutral Unit
Des: This unit will not initiate an attack but will strike back once attacked.

Name: Evil
SimpleDes: Enemy Unit
Des: This unit will actively attack the player.

Name: Chaotic Evil
SimpleDes: Enhanced Enemy Unit
Des: Enemy unit with increased HP and DMG.

Name: Red
SimpleDes: Gains the power of Fire
Des: Attacks deal an additional 20% Physical DMG and have a 20% chance to inflict Burn, dealing 20% Physical DMG per second for 3s. Also gains a new ability if a teammate of the same color is present.

Name: Yellow
SimpleDes: Gains electromagnetic power
Des: When dealing DMG, also deals 2% Physical DMG to the target every second and triggers the effects of other Damage Affixes for 4s. Also gains a new ability if a teammate of the same color is present.

Name: Blue
SimpleDes: Gains the power of Ice
Des: Attacks deal an additional 20% Physical DMG, reduce target's Movement Speed by 25%, and have a 20% chance to Freeze them for 0.7s. Also gains a new ability if a teammate of the same color is present.

Name: Green
SimpleDes: Turns into Green and gets enhanced stats
Des: Turns into Green, gains Berserk and enhanced base stats. Also gains a new ability if a teammate of the same color is present.

Name: Rigidity
SimpleDes: Gains Super Armor but takes extra DMG
Des: The enemy gains Super Armor but receives 300 more DMG when taking damage.

Name: Melee Protection
SimpleDes: Counters melee characters but gets countered by ranged characters
Des: Takes less damage from melee characters but more from ranged ones.

Name: Ranged Protection
SimpleDes: Counters ranged characters but gets countered by melee characters
Des: Takes less damage from ranged characters but more from melee ones.

Name: Noctis Galore
SimpleDes: Gains HP but boosts Noctis
Des: The enemy gets 50% more HP but takes 800% more DMG from Noctis.

Name: Enhance
SimpleDes: Enemy's stats are significantly enhanced.
Des: Enemy's stats are significantly enhanced.

Name: Unbreakable
SimpleDes: Gains a shield but becomes significantly weakened after losing the shield
Des: Gains a shield of 90% HP, but takes 500% DMG from all sources after losing the shield.

Name: Force Field
SimpleDes: Blocks low DMG but takes more DMG when it has exceeded the threshold
Des: The enemy deals less damage when receiving less than 7000 DMG and greatly more when receiving more than 7000 DMG.

Name: Splitting
SimpleDes: When the enemy's HP drops to half, they split into two with 50% HP
Des: When the enemy's HP drops below 50%, they will split into two units with 50% of original enemy's max HP.

Name: Support
SimpleDes: Summons identical units at increasing intervals
Des: Summons an identical unit at intervals. The interval increases over time.

Name: Protection
SimpleDes: Gains a shield.
Des: The enemy gains a shield of 30% Max HP.

Name: Revenge
SimpleDes: Gains Berserk but loses Resistance after a teammate dies
Des: Gains ATK and attack frequency but reduces Resistances to 0 after a teammate dies.

Name: Curse
SimpleDes: Curses the player after death, making them gain increased DMG at a cost
Des: Curses your character after death, making the character deal 1000% more DMG but die 10s later.

Name: Growth
SimpleDes: Over time, DMG increases but Resistance decreases
Des: When there is a teammate, the enemy gains a 5% DMG Bonus and loses 10% Resistances every 10s.

Name: Penetration
SimpleDes: Gains a shield. Attacks will reduce the player's Extra DMG Reduction
Des: When a teammate is present, the enemy gains a shield of 20% max HP and their attacks will reduce the player character's Extra DMG Reduction by 3%. This effect stacks up to 10 times and lasts 10s.

Name: Lightning Shield
SimpleDes: Taking a hit has a chance to summon lightning
Des: When a teammate is present, taking a hit has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 25% Lightning DMG. 2.5s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Identification

SimpleDes: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals more damage</color>. Character's attacks also come with <color=#00b48a>Fire DMG</color>.
Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals 30% more damage</color>. Character's attacks also come with <color=#00b48a>15% Fire DMG</color>.

SimpleDes: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals more damage</color>. Character's attacks also come with <color=#00b48a>Physical DMG</color>.
Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals 30% more damage</color>. Character's attacks also come with <color=#00b48a>15% Physical DMG</color>.

Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals 30% more damage</color>. Character's attacks also come with <color=#00b48a>15% Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Phantom's Price
SimpleDes: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals more damage</color>. Removes the effect temporarily and reduces Resistance when the enemy's attack is <color=#00b48a>dodged</color>.

Name: Curse of Dual Blades
SimpleDes: Character <color=#00b48a>deals more damage</color>, and when attacked, reduces stacked Resistance.
Des: Character <color=#00b48a>deals 20% more damage</color>, and<color=#B14722> when attacked</color>, reduces Resistance by 5%. Can be stacked.

Name: Incineration Protocol
SimpleDes: Enemy takes more <color=#00b48a>Ignition DMG</color> and less <color=#B14722>other damage</color>.
Des: Enemy takes 30% more <color=#00b48a>Ignition DMG</color> and less 10% <color=#B14722>other damage</color>.

Name: Rampager's Price
SimpleDes: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>Berserk 3</color>. Character <color=#00b48a>deals more damage</color>.
Des: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>Berserk 3</color>. Character <color=#00b48a>deals 20% more damage</color>.

Name: Final Stand
SimpleDes: Enemy deals more <color=#B14722>damage</color> and gains more <color=#B14722>Resistance</color> when having less HP.
Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals 10% more damage</color> and gains <color=#B14722>5% more Resistance</color> for every 10% HP lost. Max 4 stacks.

Name: Combo Resonance
SimpleDes: Enemy <color=#B14722>gains HP</color>. Character's attacks also come with <color=#00b48a>Combo DMG</color>.
Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>gains 3000000 HP</color>. Character's attacks also come with damage equal to <color=#00b48a>combo count x30</color>.

Name: Spreading Nightmare
SimpleDes: <color=#00b48a>All summons</color> gain HP and Berserk 3.
Des: <color=#00b48a>All summons</color> gain 20w HP and Berserk 3.

Name: Blade Protocol
SimpleDes: Enemy takes more <color=#00b48a>Ultima Slash DMG</color> and less <color=#B14722>other damage</color>.
Des: Enemy takes 30% more <color=#00b48a>Ultima Slash DMG</color> and 10% less <color=#B14722>other damage</color>.

Name: Symphony of Shadows
SimpleDes: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals more damage</color>. Character <color=#00b48a>summons a random unit</color> every after a certain number of combos.
Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>deals 25% more damage</color>. Character <color=#00b48a>summons a random unit</color> every after 300 combos.

Name: Chaotic Multiplication
SimpleDes: Enemy has a <color=#B14722>higher summon limit</color> but also deals AOE DMG <color=#00b48a>to their allies</color> when casting skills.
Des: Enemy has <color=#B14722>summon limit +2</color> but also deals AOE DMG <color=#00b48a>to their allies</color> when casting skills.

Name: Chaotic Symbiosis
SimpleDes: Enemy's summons <color=#B14722>deal more damage</color> but will <color=#00b48a>pass on a part of damage taken to the enemy</color>.
Des: Enemy's summons <color=#B14722>deal 25% more damage</color> but will <color=#00b48a>pass on 30% of damage taken to the enemy</color>.

Name: The Tortured
SimpleDes: Enemy takes <color=#B14722>limited damage</color> for each attack.
Des: Enemy takes <color=#B14722>no more than 0.7% of their Max HP</color> for each attack.

Name: Infinite Charge
SimpleDes: Enemy <color=#B14722>charges more frequently</color> and <color=#00b48a>deals damage to their allies</color> when charging.
Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>charges more frequently</color> and <color=#00b48a>deals damage to their allies</color> when charging.

Name: Death Race
SimpleDes: When charging, enemy temporarily <color=#B14722>deals more damage</color> and <color=#00b48a>loses Resistance</color>.
Des: When charging, enemy temporarily <color=#B14722>deals 30% more damage</color> and <color=#00b48a>loses 20% Resistance</color>.

Name: 3-Ping Privilege
SimpleDes: Only <color=#B14722>3-Pings</color> can trigger special statuses.
Des: Only <color=#B14722>3-Pings</color> can trigger special statuses.

Name: Fatal Speed
SimpleDes: Game will be lost in <color=#B14722>180s</color>.
Des: Game will be lost in <color=#B14722>180s</color>.

Name: Wheel of Colors
SimpleDes: Enemy will not be able to enter any special status for some time when receiving an attack of a <color=#B14722>different color</color>.
Des: Enemy will not be able to enter any special status for 5s when receiving an attack of a <color=#B14722>different color</color>.

Name: Berserker's Price
SimpleDes: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>Berserk 3</color> but <color=#00b48a>loses HP</color> when casting skills.
Des: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>Berserk 3</color> but <color=#00b48a>loses 5% of current HP</color> when casting a skill.

Name: Dodge Orb!
SimpleDes: When character <color=#B14722>is attacked</color>, removes 1 Orb.
Des: When character <color=#B14722>is attacked</color>, removes 1 Orb.

Name: Brave Dodger
SimpleDes: Character <color=#B14722>deals less damage</color>, but the damage increases for each <color=#00b48a>Extreme Dodge</color> performed. The effect resets when character takes damage.
Des: Character <color=#B14722>deals 5% less damage</color>, but the damage increases by 10% for each <color=#00b48a>Extreme Dodge</color> performed. Max 4 stacks. The effect lasts 8s and resets when character takes damage.

Name: Self-Destruction Bug Nest: Ally
SimpleDes: Character summons 1 immovable neutral Self-Destruction Bug for each attack.
Des: Character summons 1 immovable neutral Self-Destruction Bug for each attack.

Name: Self-Destruction Bug Nest: Enemy
SimpleDes: Enemy summons 1 Self-Destruction Bug when <color=#B14722>casting a skill</color>.
Des: Enemy summons 1 Self-Destruction Bug when <color=#B14722>casting a skill</color>.

Name: Berserk Countdown
SimpleDes: Enemies <color=#B14722>respawn upon death</color>. Self-Destruction Bugs spawn continuously in the stage. <color=#00b48a>Survive 60s</color> to win.
Des: Enemies <color=#B14722>respawn upon death</color>. Self-Destruction Bugs spawn continuously in the stage. <color=#00b48a>Survive 60s</color> to win.

Name: Clumsy Tax
SimpleDes: Enemy attacks <color=#B14722>reduce character Dodge</color>.
Des: Enemy attacks <color=#B14722>reduce character Dodge by 100 points</color>.

Name: Fatigue Relay
SimpleDes: Character suffers a <color=#B14722>damage decrease</color> at intervals. The effect will be removed when character<color=#00b48a> exits the battlefield</color>.
Des: Character suffers a <color=#B14722>2.5% damage decrease</color> every 5s. Max 8 stacks. The effect will be removed when character<color=#00b48a> exits the battlefield</color>.

Name: Backstab Temptation
SimpleDes: Enemy becomes immobile at intervals, receiving less damage from <color=#B14722>front</color> but more damage from <color=#00b48a>back</color>.
Des: Enemy becomes immobile every 8s, receiving 10% less damage from <color=#B14722>front</color> but 20% more damage from <color=#00b48a>back</color>.

Name: Tyrant Recovery
SimpleDes: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>Berserk 3</color> and more healing
Des: Enemy gains <color=#B14722>Berserk 3</color> and 10% more healing

Name: Broken Armor
SimpleDes: Enemy <color=#B14722>gains HP</color> but takes <color=#00b48a>Extra DMG</color> when Shield is reduced.
Des: Enemy <color=#B14722>gains 1000 HP</color> but takes <color=#00b48a>10% Extra DMG</color> when Shield is reduced.

Name: Armored Crash
SimpleDes: Enemy deals damage <color=#B14722>based on their Shield</color>. The effect has cooldown.
Des: Enemy deals damage <color=#B14722>equal to 5% of their Shield</color>. Cooldown: 10s.

Name: Eternal Pact
SimpleDes: Character on the battlefield <color=#B14722>loses HP slowly over time</color> and cannot be healed.
Des: Character <color=#B14722>takes 10 damage</color> every 3s and cannot be healed.
